sourceQuestion: やっぱ色々教えないとな
activeQuestion: やっぱ色々教えないとな
sourceComments:
I guess I still need to teach her a lot of things.

yappa (short of yappari): as expected; still, as before. I think I mentioned this already: I found this word quite hard to learn. Most of the time, the "as expected" from the dictionary fits well, but sometimes, it also translates to "still" in English. Maggie sensei's explanation is very good, she lists 3 use cases - read the ref for details. I'm sure there's also a video on YouTube explaining this.

You'll somehow get used to this word over time ;).
reading: やっぱ いろいろ おしえない と な

parsingResult.sentence: やっぱ色々教えないとな
